text: 308 is a number. It comes after 307 and before 309. == In mathematics == * 308 is an even number. * It is a composite number, which means it has more than two factors. * The prime factorization of 308 is: 308 = 2 × 2 × 7 × 11 = 2² × 7 × 11 * The digits of 308 add up to 11 (3 + 0 + 8 = 11). * 1.797 x 10^308 is the maximum accepted double-precision floating-point numbers are used in computers to store very big or very small decimal numbers with a lot of precision.
title: 308 (number)
